Name: Circa Infinity
About the game: Circa Infinity is a brain-melting circular platformer by Kenny Sun, with a pulse-pounding soundtrack by Jack + Jim Fay. Quotes 'MY BRAIN IS MELTING!' - Pewdiepie 'I like the idea that games can sometimes be music videos, especially when they're as striking and well-soundtracked as Circa Infinity.' - Tom Senior, PC Gamer 'Its smelled my brain but i love it.' - Maurice, 19 'One of the craziest games I've ever played.' - Bhernardo Viana, Indie Game Magazine
Meta Title: Circa Infinity: Sep 8, 2015, Kenny Sun and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Circa Infinity? Check out the release date (Sep 8, 2015), developer insights from Kenny Sun, and a complete game summary.
